title: 3v3 Ranked team s
body:
Really 7hour window 3 days a week to play 3v3 ranked teams how @#%$%$# Dumb is that S#!7. Really Riot why not something like 12-12 Monday -Saturday


But 5pm to 11:59 Thursday - Saturday... Dumb just dumb.............It makes me want all the money back that I put into this game..=(

replies.body: Yeah I've been waiting for 3v3 ranked since the start of this server :-( ...
at least you lads get ranked 3's. Other servers are not so lucky.{{item:3070}}
Really I didn't know, 3s are so much fun, I like the map size better, and my wife and I and brother in law play as a ranked team, and with that time window might as well take it away..{{item:3073}}

I mean for years its been fine, Riot  is like a drug dealer they give you what you want, then jack the price up when your addicted. It will be months before I will get o play a 3v3 ranked team game now cause a such a short window to play F%#@*&^ dumb.. Might as well just make the game solo que ranked take all other game modes away.
